title: Glamorous Central Leeds Escape Overlooking City Square
description:
Housed in one of the most iconic buildings in Leeds, The Queens Hotel has been welcoming the rich and famous since it swung open its doors in 1937. An escape here means following in the illustrious footsteps of Grace Kelly, Cary Grant, Nelson Mandela, and Laurel and Hardy.

Stylish, glamorous and part of The QHotels Collection, synonymous with luxury and grandeur, this city sanctuary is reminiscent of the golden age of the railway and adorned in elegant Art Deco style. Following a refurbishment fit for royalty in 2021, The Queens Hotel offers more glitzy facilities than ever. Savour Asian-inspired flavours and classic cocktails in the delightfully decadent Grand Pacific restaurant and bar, enjoy coffee and cake in the Café Pacific social hub or take the 10-minute stroll to Victoria Quarter for a designer shopping spree.
offer_address: New Station Street City Square, Leeds LS1 1PJ, United Kingdom

vendor_name: Oulton Hall Hotel, Spa & Golf Resort
title: Historic Yorkshire Spa & Golf Escape with 27-Hole Course
description:
Revel in the exceptional beauty of Yorkshire with a one-of-a-kind stay at Oulton Hall Hotel, Spa & Golf Resort - housed within an 18th-century mansion. Set just a short distance from Leeds, this luxury resort places you within close reach of the city while offering laidback country ambience.

Enthusiastic golfers can tee off at the resort’s 27-hole course where curving fairways and immaculate greens offer the perfect challenge for all levels, and The Claret Jug clubhouse is the place to refuel and celebrate after the last hole. Away from the green, the indoor heated pool, health club and spa offer an oasis of calm to ensure a blissful escape. The Calverley Grill is the place to go for mouthwatering fare, and when you need to toast those extra special moments, take a seat at the Champagne Bar and choose from over 50 international sparkling varieties.
location_description: Oulton Hall Hotel, Spa & Golf Resort
offer_address: Rothwell Ln, Oulton, Leeds LS26 8HN, United Kingdom

title: UK Stylish Leeds Contemporary Retreat within City Centre
description: Discover how Leeds reinvented itself from an industrial town to a vibrant, cosmopolitan city with an escape to Crowne Plaza Leeds, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly positioned in the city centre, spring into this confident Yorkshire city in search of lively nightlife, contemporary art at The Tetley and indulgent shopping. Once you return, feast on a selection of delicious plates with a Yorkshire twist at LS1 restaurant or visit the expansive Spirit Health Club and enjoy a restorative soak in the indoor pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Leeds, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Wellington Street, Leeds LS1 4DL, United Kingdom
